member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.CanvasExtensions.FillArc(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Paint,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Fills the arc with the specified paint. This is a helper method for when filling an arc with a gradient, so that you don't need to worry about calculating the gradient handle locations based on the rectangle size and location.
member.param: The direction to draw the arc

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.CanvasExtensions.DrawArc(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas,Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.RectF,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws the arc. This is a helper method to draw an arc when you have a rectangle already defined for the ellipse bounds.
member.param: The direction to draw the arc
If the arc is closed or not

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.CanvasExtensions.DrawArc(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas,Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Rect,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws the arc. This is a helper method to draw an arc when you have a rectangle already defined for the ellipse bounds.
member.param: The direction to draw the arc
If the arc is closed or not

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.CanvasExtensions.FillArc(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas,Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.RectF,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Fills the arc. This is a helper method to fill an arc when you have a rectangle already defined for the ellipse bounds.
member.param: The direction to draw the arc

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.CanvasExtensions.FillArc(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas,Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Rect,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Fills the arc. This is a helper method to fill an arc when you have a rectangle already defined for the ellipse bounds.
member.param: The direction to draw the arc

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.CanvasExtensions.EnableDefaultShadow(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas,System.Single)
member.summary: Enables the default shadow.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.CanvasExtensions.ResetStroke(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.ICanvas)
member.summary: Resets the stroke to the default settings: - Stroke Size: 1 - Stroke Dash Pattern: None - Stroke Location: Center - Stroke Line Join: Miter - Stroke Line Cap: Butt - Stroke Brush: None - Stroke Color: Black

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.GeometryUtil.EllipseAngleToPoint(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Gets the point on an ellipse that corresponds to the given angle.
member.param: The x position of the bounding rectangle.
The y position of the bounding rectangle.
The width of the bounding rectangle.
The height of the bounding rectangle.

members.member: Return true if c is between a and b.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Insets.Horizontal
member.summary: The sum of the left and right insets.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Insets.Vertical
member.summary: The sum of the top and bottom insets.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.InsetsF.Horizontal
member.summary: The sum of the left and right insets.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.InsetsF.Vertical
member.summary: The sum of the top and bottom insets.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Matrix3x2Extensions.CreateMatrix3x2(System.Numerics.Vector2,System.Single,System.Numerics.Vector2)
member.summary: Creates a matrix from an SRT.
member.remarks:
This is equivalent to:
m = Matrix3x2.CreateScale(scale)
m *= Matri3x2.CreateRotation(rotation)
m *= Matri3x2.CreateTranslation(translation)

members.member: Converts a svg arc specification to a Degrafa arc.
Draws an arc of type "open" only. Accepts an optional x axis rotation value
